summary:
Three balloons will be added to the sky of Whiterun.
You can go to a north iceberg. There is a warehouse there.
descriptionHtml:
----------------
Whiterun Balloon Site (ver 2.1)
----------------

[b]Three balloons will be added to the sky of Whiterun.
You can go to a north iceberg. There is a warehouse there.
Since a dragon is a guard, don\'t kill him.[/b]

[b][color=yellow]V2 is straddling both Tamriel and Whiterun World. 
Since significant changes have been made , this was treated as a separate MOD.[/color][/b]

[b][color=red]Please be sure to back up your save file.[/color][/b]

Whiterun Balloon Site (Ver 1.1)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15008


---
Author : hdela


---
This mod was built with Skyrim US Ver 1.5.24.0


---
Installation : Unzip the file, and overwrite Skyrim Data folder. Or drop the esp into your Skyrim Data directory.


---
Ver 2.1 :

The fence was attached to the place where a person doesn\'t permit falling. 
A small part was edited.


Ver 2.0 :

Bedroll x3
No respawn container x9 (Iceberg warehouse container +10)
Automatic bookshelf x2 (Iceberg warehouse bookshelf +8)
Disply case x6

Alchemy Workbench
Enchanting Workbench

Cooking Pot


---
Enjoy!

by hdela
author: hdela
